entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
